localize.title: Product Hunt 人気の作品

blogPost.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
blogPost.body: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
blogPost.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click
blogPost.author: Colin Hunt

localize.description: 只需点击一下，就可以计划一整周的用餐时间。只要告诉我们你喜欢哪些食物，以及你想吃多少卡路里、蛋白质、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。换一顿饭，换一天，或者换一周！我们可以安排您的款待，甚至还可以给您一张购物清单！
localize.tagline: 只需单击一次即可生成自定义餐饮计划

localize.description: 只需點擊一下，就可以計劃一整週的用餐時間。只要告訴我們你喜歡哪些食物，以及你想喫多少卡路里、蛋白質、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。換一頓飯，換一天，或者換一週！我們可以安排您的款待，甚至還可以給您一張購物清單！
localize.tagline: 只需單擊一次即可生成自定義餐飲計劃

previous.excerpt: Quick Calc is a simple and easy-to-use calculator which can be directly accessed from the menu bar with the click of a button.
previous.title: Quick Calc - An elegant calculator for your menu bar.

localize.description: Quick Calc是一个简单易用的计算器，只需单击一个按钮，即可从菜单栏直接访问。
localize.tagline: 一个优雅的计算器，为您的菜单栏。

localize.description: Quick Calc是一個簡單易用的計算器，只需單擊一個按鈕，即可從菜單欄直接訪問。
localize.tagline: 一個優雅的計算器，爲您的菜單欄。

next.excerpt: Linksistent is a Chrome extension that provides a consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma design files or prototypes.
next.title: Linksistent - A consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma designs.

localize.description: Linksistent是一个Chrome扩展，为最新的Figma设计文件或原型提供统一的访问点。
localize.tagline: 适用于最新Figma设计的整合接入点。

localize.description: Linksistent是一個Chrome擴展，爲最新的Figma設計文件或原型提供統一的訪問點。
localize.tagline: 適用於最新Figma設計的整合接入點。
